title: MIBiG Lite Submission form
description: Please fill out this form to submit MIBiG data on a biosynthetic pathway.

submitter_institution.title: Your institution
submitter_institution.description: Please use the full, official name of your institute in English.

biosyn_class.title: Biosynthetic class
biosyn_class.description: Hold ctrl or cmd key to select multiple items

Start coordinate.title: Start coordinate
Start coordinate.description: May be left empty if gene cluster covers entire GenBank nucleotide record.

End coordinate.title: End coordinate
End coordinate.description: May be left empty if gene cluster covers entire GenBank nucleotide record.

ribo_marker.title: Host organism 16S marker gene
ribo_marker.description: 16S rRNA nucleotide sequence of strain of origin

chem_struct.title: Compound structure
chem_struct.description: Chemical structure entered as SMILES string, preferentially isomeric

evidence_struct.title: Technique(s) used to elucidate structure
evidence_struct.description: Hold ctrl or cmd key to select multiple items

mol_mass.title: Exact molecular mass
mol_mass.description: Exact molecular mass in Daltons. Use a dot as a decimal point, not a comma.

chem_act.title: Molecular activities
chem_act.description: Hold ctrl or cmd key to select multiple items. Enter only proven activities; always provide the publication IDs where the evidence was provided under 'Key publications' below.

chem_target.title: Molecular targets
chem_target.description: Enter proteins, RNAs or other (macro)molecules targeted by this compound, separated by comma's. Enter only proven targets; always provide the publication IDs where the evidence was provided under 'Key publications' below.

chem_moieties.title: Unusual chemical moieties in this molecule
chem_moieties.description: With 'unusual', it is meant that they are not covered by NRPS/PKS/RiPP/terpene/saccharide biosynthetic mechanisms.

subcluster.title: Subcluster involved in the biosynthesis of this moiety
subcluster.description: Enter locus tags, protein IDs or gene IDs (in this order of preference) exactly as they are specified in the submitted GenBank/ENA/DDBJ entry, separated by comma's.

gene_id.title: Gene ID
gene_id.description: Enter locus tag, protein ID or gene ID (in this order of preference) exactly as it is specified in the submitted GenBank/ENA/DDBJ entry.

mut_pheno.title: Knockout mutation phenotype for this gene, if known

operon_genes.title: Genes in operon
operon_genes.description: Enter locus tags, protein IDs or gene IDs (in this order of preference) that make up this operon, exactly as they are specified in the submitted GenBank/ENA/DDBJ entry, from 5' to 3', separated by comma's.

publications.title: Key publications associated with this gene cluster, pathway or molecule
publications.description: Publications describing experiments on this pathway. Please input PubMed IDs, separated by comma's.

lin_cycl_nrp.description: Also counts as cyclic if the molecule is hybrid and the NRP cyclizes onto another part of the hybrid molecule.

nrps_genes.title: NRPS genes in cluster
nrps_genes.description: Nonribosomal peptide synthetase-encoding genes; use locus_tags or protein IDs matching those in the GenBank entry

module_nr.title: Assembly line module number
module_nr.description: Counting starts from 1. Every module with at least an A-domain (or AT-domain, in the case of hybrid assembly-lines) is included. For hybrids, PKS modules are included in the counting.

other_spec.title: Specify other amino acid
other_spec.description: Use the monomer nomenclature from NORINE whenever possible.

multiple_spec.title: Specify promiscuous amino acid specificity
multiple_spec.description: Input multiple amino acids, separated by semi-colons (';'). Use the monomer nomenclature from NORINE whenever possible.

subcluster.title: Sub-cluster for amino acid biosynthesis, if within this gene cluster
subcluster.description: Enter locus tags, protein IDs or gene IDs (in this order of preference) exactly as they are specified in the submitted GenBank/ENA/DDBJ entry, separated by comma's. A sub-cluster only needs to be declared once, in case there are multiple instances of the nonproteinogenic amino acid in the assembly-line.

evidence_a_spec.title: Evidence
evidence_a_spec.description: Choose 'None' if substrate specificity not known or not applicable.

cdom_subtype.title: Subtype of condensation domain in this module
cdom_subtype.description: Epimerization domains are not counted as C domains, but as a separate domain type.

mod_skip_iter.title: Module skipped or iterated during biosynthesis?

thioesterase.title: Thioesterase-encoding gene(s):
thioesterase.description: Enter locus tags, protein IDs or gene IDs (in this order of preference) exactly as they are specified in the submitted GenBank/ENA/DDBJ entry, separated by comma's.

lin_cycl_nrp.description: Also counts as cyclic if the molecule is hybrid and the polyketide cyclizes onto another part of the hybrid molecule.

locus_tag.title: PKS-encoding gene:
locus_tag.description: Modular polyketide synthase-encoding gene; Enter locus tag, protein ID or gene ID (in this order of preference) exactly as it is specified in the submitted GenBank/ENA/DDBJ entry.

pks_domains.title: Core PKS domains present in this module
pks_domains.description: Hold ctrl or cmd key to select multiple items

at_substr_spec.title: AT domain substrate specificity
at_substr_spec.description: Enter 'None' if no AT-domain present (e.g., for trans-AT modules). Enter 'Unknown' if specificity not known.

evidence_at_spec.title: Evidence for AT specificity
evidence_at_spec.description: Choose 'None' if substrate specificity not known or not applicable.

kr_stereochem.title: KR domain stereochemistry / activity
kr_stereochem.description: A-group / B-group according to Caffrey, ChemBioChem 2003.

mod_doms.title: Nonreductive scaffold-modifying domains in this module
mod_doms.description: Any additional modifications made by domains within module

mod_skip_iter.title: Module skipped or iterated during biosynthesis?

pks_genes.title: Genes in cluster encoding polyketide synthases / ketosynthases
pks_genes.description: Enter locus tags, protein IDs or gene IDs (in this order of preference), exactly as they are specified in the submitted GenBank/ENA/DDBJ entry, separated by comma's. For Type II PKSs, do not include chain length factor-encoding genes.

nr_iterations.title: Number of chain synthesis iterations performed by iterative PKS module

trans_at.title: Genes in cluster encoding trans-acyltransferases
trans_at.description: Enter locus tags, protein IDs or gene IDs (in this order of preference), exactly as they are specified in the submitted GenBank/ENA/DDBJ entry, separated by comma's.

ketide_length.title: Polyketide length
ketide_length.description: Length of the ketide chain, e.g. 6 for a hexaketide or 9 for a nonaketide.

cyclases.title: Gene(s) in cluster encoding polyketide cyclase(s) / aromatase(s)
cyclases.description: Enter locus tags, protein IDs or gene IDs (in this order of preference), exactly as they are specified in the submitted GenBank/ENA/DDBJ entry, separated by comma's.

thioesterase.title: Thioesterase-encoding gene(s):
thioesterase.description: Enter locus tags, protein IDs or gene IDs (in this order of preference) exactly as they are specified in the submitted GenBank/ENA/DDBJ entry, separated by comma's.

precursor_loci.title: Genes in cluster encoding RiPP precursor peptides

gene_id.title: Gene ID:
gene_id.description: Enter locus tags, protein IDs or gene IDs (in this order of preference) that make up this operon, exactly as they are specified in the submitted GenBank/ENA/DDBJ entry, separated by comma's.

core_pept_aa.title: RiPP core peptide amino acid sequence
core_pept_aa.description: Input sequence as single-AA abbreviations, e.g. 'ITSISLCTPGCKTGALMGCNMKTATCHCSIHVSK'

lead_pept_len.title: Length of the leader peptide
lead_pept_len.description: Length in AA, including N-terminal signal if present.

cleavage_recogn_site.title: Amino acid sequence of cleavage recognition site, if known

recogn_motif.title: Recognition motif in leader peptide for modification peptide

peptidase.title: Peptidase(s) involved in precursor cleavage
peptidase.description: Enter locus tags, protein IDs or gene IDs (in this order of preference), exactly as they are used in the submitted GenBank/ENA/DDBJ entry, separated by comma's.

AA_pos_1.title: Position of first amino acid involved

AA_pos_2.title: Position of second amino acid involved

terpene_c_len.title: Number of isoprene units in the molecule

terpene_synth_cycl.title: Genes in cluster encoding terpene synthases/cyclases
terpene_synth_cycl.description: Enter locus tags, protein IDs or gene IDs (in this order of preference), exactly as they are specified in the submitted GenBank/ENA/DDBJ entry, separated by comma's.

prenyl_transf.title: Genes in cluster encoding prenyltransferases
prenyl_transf.description: Enter locus tags, protein IDs or gene IDs (in this order of preference), exactly as they are specified in the submitted GenBank/ENA/DDBJ entry, separated by comma's.

gt_genes.title: Genes in cluster encoding glycosyl transferases

gt_locus.title: Gene ID
gt_locus.description: Enter locus tag, protein ID or gene ID (in this order of preference), exactly as it is used in the submitted GenBank/ENA/DDBJ entry.

sugar_subcluster.title: Sub-cluster for sugar biosynthesis, if within this gene cluster
sugar_subcluster.description: Enter locus tags, gene IDs or protein IDs, separated by comma's. A sub-cluster only needs to be declared once, in case there are multiple glycosyltransferases with the same substrate specificity.
